name: Hentai Glass
description:
Welcome to Hentai Glass!

A unique puzzle where art and beauty meet in vintage Japanese glass frames. This game is a journey through glass and puzzles, where each level represents a new opportunity to create something beautiful.

Features of the game:


  • 80 exciting levels: Immerse yourself in two different parts of the game. The first half offers to collect vintage glass works with Japanese motifs - from landscapes to mythical creatures. The second half is dedicated to anime, where you collect pieces to create gorgeous images of anime girls.
  • Unique gameplay: Start with a frame and add glass fragments to create fascinating works of art. Use the hints to make the task easier.
  • Simple mechanics: Intuitive gameplay will make even beginners in this genre feel at home.
  • Relaxing music: Accompanying each level with relaxing melodies creates the perfect atmosphere for puzzles.
  • Steam Achievements: Get special achievements by completing levels.

Hentai Glass is perfect for fans of puzzles and Japanese. The game offers both challenge and relaxation, making it an ideal choice for short breaks or long gaming sessions.

Don't forget to add the game to the vishlist and favorites!
